quote: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday. – Steve Maraboli
fact: The average talker sprays about 300 microscopic saliva droplets per minute, about 2.5 droplets per word.
joke: Did you hear the one about the giant pickle?  He was kind of a big dill.
